title: Modern Arc Floor Lamp
description: A sleek arc floor lamp with a metal finish, perfect for modern living rooms and reading corners.

title: Classic Tripod Floor Lamp
description: A stylish tripod floor lamp with fabric shade, adding elegance to any room.

title: Adjustable LED Floor Lamp
description: An energy-efficient LED floor lamp with adjustable brightness and flexible head for task lighting.

title: Rustic Wooden Floor Lamp
description: A wooden floor lamp with a vintage design, ideal for rustic or farmhouse interiors.

title: Minimalist Slim Floor Lamp
description: A slim, minimalist floor lamp that fits perfectly in small spaces or corners.

title: Industrial Metal Floor Lamp
description: A sturdy industrial-style floor lamp with exposed bulbs, perfect for loft-style interiors.
